article: officials from asean -lrb- the association of southeast asian nations -rrb- who gathered in siemreap city , northern cambodia have drafted an agreement on joint development of tourism , the rasmei kampuchea daily in khmer reported on thursday .
abstract: asean countries join hands in developing tourism
